long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to search on amazon easily.

All you have to do is:
1. Highlight any text.
2. Right click on text.
3. Choose "Search selected text on Amazon"

You can do this from any page.
